page.title: 09GRINDLEFORD'S ROAD HAZARDS
page.content: {WARNING ======= Grindleford main road is a {hazard for pets and for children.There is no lollipop lady and we think that there should be one.Sir William Hill is a dangerous spot by our school and a lorry has been through the school playground wall.Now we have an extra wall to protect pedestrians and us. { GRINDLEFORD BRIDGE =========== ====== The bridge in Grindleford can only hold one way traffic and so they have to have traffic lights.All this is because of the new big lorries that are using our main roads.The Grindleford bridge is very old and will not take the weight of two large lorries on the bridge at the same time.
